text.p:
There is delay of 2323 days in preferring the instant Review Petition. We have
gone through the contents of the application seeking condonation of delay. The
explanation offered is far from being satisfactory. The application for condonation
of delay is, therefore, rejected.
Consequently, the Review Petition stands rejected on the ground of delay.

New Delhi;
December 14, 2021.
Digitally signed by Dr.
Mukesh Nasa
Date: 2021.12.17
15:51:58 IST
Reason:
Signature Not Verified
